name: telegraf-googledrive
description: a Telegraf middleware for reading data from google drive

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && babel --ignore node_modules,dist,tasks,config.*,test/ --out-dir ./dist/npm . && cp LICENSE package.json yarn.lock ./dist/npm
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build && npm publish dist/npm
scripts.ppp: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm
scripts.mpp: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm

author: Frederico Marques <frederico.marques.22@gmail.com>
